targets.query: SELECT first("btc_ltp") FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("btc_ltp") FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("btc_ltp") FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("btc_ltp") FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT spot_buy_volume + spot_sell_volume FROM "trade_btc" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(last("btc_ltp"), 25) FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT first("eth_ltp") FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("eth_ltp") FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT min("eth_ltp") FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("eth_ltp") FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT spot_buy_volume + spot_sell_volume FROM "trade_eth" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(last("eth_ltp"), 25) FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(spot_buy_value, 100) / moving_average(spot_sell_value, 100) FROM "trade_btc" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(future_buy_value, 100) / moving_average(future_sell_value, 100) FROM "trade_btc" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(spot_buy_value, 100) / moving_average(spot_sell_value, 100) FROM "trade_eth" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(future_buy_value, 100) / moving_average(future_sell_value, 100) FROM "trade_eth" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(ls_ratio_binanceF_global, 100) FROM "delta_ls_btcusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(ls_ratio_binanceF_global, 30) FROM "delta_ls_btcusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT ls_ratio_binanceF_global FROM "delta_ls_btcusd" WHERE $timeFilter  fill(null)

panels.title: BTC 先物 Long/Short  比率

targets.query: SELECT moving_average(ls_ratio_binanceF_global, 100) FROM "delta_ls_ethusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(ls_ratio_binanceF_global, 30) FROM "delta_ls_ethusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT ls_ratio_binanceF_global FROM "delta_ls_ethusd" WHERE $timeFilter  fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT  moving_average(btc_ltp, 100) - moving_average(btc_index_price, 100) FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter  fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(eth_ltp, 100) - moving_average(eth_index_price, 100) FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter  fill(null)
SELECT mean("btc_predicted_fr") FROM "indicator" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("eth_predicted_fr") FROM "indicator" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("btc_oi_value") - moving_average(mean("btc_oi_value"), 100)  FROM "indicator" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("eth_oi_value") - moving_average(mean("eth_oi_value"), 100)  FROM "indicator" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT delta_ls_binanceF_global_4h FROM "delta_ls_btcusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT delta_ls_binanceF_top_4h FROM "delta_ls_btcusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT delta_ls_binanceF_global_8h FROM "delta_ls_btcusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT delta_ls_binanceF_top_8h FROM "delta_ls_btcusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT delta_ls_bybit_4h FROM "delta_ls_btcusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(delta_ls_binanceF_global_4h, 100) FROM "delta_ls_btcusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT mean("delta_ls_binanceF_global_4h") - moving_average(mean("delta_ls_binanceF_global_4h"), 100)  FROM "delta_ls_btcusd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT delta_ls_binanceF_global_4h FROM "delta_ls_ethusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT delta_ls_binanceF_top_4h FROM "delta_ls_ethusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT delta_ls_binanceF_global_8h FROM "delta_ls_ethusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT delta_ls_binanceF_top_8h FROM "delta_ls_ethusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT delta_ls_bybit_4h FROM "delta_ls_ethusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(delta_ls_binanceF_global_4h, 100) FROM "delta_ls_ethusd" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
SELECT mean("delta_ls_binanceF_global_4h") - moving_average(mean("delta_ls_binanceF_global_4h"), 100)  FROM "delta_ls_ethusd" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT moving_average(btc_ltp_futures_u, 100) - moving_average(btc_ltp_futures_z, 100) FROM "market" WHERE $timeFilter fill(null)
